mapper.select: select sabun, join_day, retire_day, put_yn, name, reg_no, eng_name, phone, hp, carrier, pos_gbn_code, cmp_reg_no, cmp_reg_image, sex, years, email, zip, addr1, addr2, dept_code, wokringstatus, id, pwd, salary, kosa_reg_yn, kosa_class_code, mil_yn, mil_type, mil_level, mil_startdate, mil_enddate, job_type, gart_level, self_intro, crm_name from insa where sabun = #{sabun} order by sabun
